hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Saeed Al-Khudri said:"The Messenger of Allah said: Whoever fasts a day in the cause of Allah, Allah will separate his face (a distance of) seventy autumns from the fire in return for that day

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى سُفْيَانَ الثَّوْرِيِّ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the differences reported from Sufyan Ath-Thawri
